amendment.description: Amendment requires the Solar Technology Roadmap Committee to release a draft Roadmap to the public at least one month prior to publication in order to receive public input.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 111-304 to require the Solar Technology Roadmap Committee to release a draft Roadmap to the public at least one month prior to publication in order to receive public input.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Heinrich amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 0 (Roll no. 805).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Heinrich.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Heinrich amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 0 (Roll no. 805).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
